Report.Query: select RUN_DATE as RunDate, Morning_M_COUNT as MorningMCount, Morning_M_ONTIME_COUNT as MorningMOntimeCount, Morning_M_OnTime_ratio as MorningMOnTimeRatio, Morning_H_COUNT as MorningHCount, Morning_H_ONTIME_COUNT as MorningHOntimeCount, Morning_H_OnTime_ratio as MorningHOnTimeRatio, Noon_M_COUNT as NoonMCount, Noon_M_ONTIME_COUNT as NoonMOntimeCount, Noon_M_OnTime_ratio as NoonMOnTimeRatio, Afternoon_M_COUNT as AfternoonMCount, Afternoon_M_ONTIME_COUNT as AfternoonMOntimeCount, Afternoon_M_OnTime_ratio as AfternoonMOnTimeRatio, Afternoon_H_COUNT as AfternoonHCount, Afternoon_H_ONTIME_COUNT as AfternoonHOntimeCount, Afternoon_H_OnTime_ratio as AfternoonHOnTimeRatio, Org_Group as OrgGroup from RPT_SVCQUALITY_DEPONTIME
